    • updateUser

      public void updateUser​(java.util.UUID userId, UserDTO userDTO)
      Updates user by userId based on input given in UserDTO validated before by request validators. Update will only be performed on field if its value is different than null. User token will be revoked only if edited fields are one of the following: email, password.
      Parameters:
      userId - User UUID.
      userDTO - Updated user.

    • replaceUser

      public void replaceUser​(java.util.UUID userId, UserDTO userDTO)
      Replaces user fields by userId based on input given in UserDTO validated before by request validators. All fields will be overwritten and user will be required to generate new token.
      Parameters:
      userId - User UUID
      userDTO - Replacement user.

    • getUserMiniFriends

      public java.util.List<UserDTO> getUserMiniFriends​(java.util.UUID userId)

      Returns:
